title: Fibre C
content:
what are the fonts used on the fibre C website?

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20130820012028im_/http:/typophile.com/files/fibrec_5588.jpg)
author: gncalix

comments.content: Hard to say, very few letters and not so distinctive. Something between Helvetica and DIN so may be [Akkurat](http://web.archive.org/web/20130820012028/http:/lineto.com/The+Fonts/Font+Categories/Text+Fonts/Akkurat).
Already had a look to the website and that's why I said Akkurat. Have you even try it using their TypeWriter? Because, this is very close if not matching.

ill try TypeWriter and see what comes up.

Thanks!
